    • Method Detail

      • resetChessBoard

        public static void resetChessBoard()
        To check chess board's black color ("## ") coordinate. If find black color coordinate become white color, use this method check white color to black

      • identityPieces

        public static void identityPieces()
        To check which pieces of chess are you move, and at same time to call the different pieces method dependent which pieces are you moved. In this method also include the Illegal move, check and which sides player win this game.

      • isCheckMated

        private static boolean isCheckMated(int x,
                                    int y)
        Identification of check-mate
        Parameters:
        x - Row coordinate of start position.
        y - Column coordinate of start position
        Returns:
        If check-mate return .

      • promotion

        private static void promotion(int x,
                              int y,
                              int a,
                              int b)
        Identification of Pawn Promotion,if pawn reach other side immediately changed into the player's choice of a queen, knight, rook, or bishop of the same color
        Parameters:
        x - Row coordinate of start position.
        y - Column coordinate of start position.
        a - Row coordinate of end position.
        b - Column coordinate of end position.

      • Castling

        private static void Castling(int x,
                             int y,
                             int a,
                             int b)
        Identification of Castling. If the king and the chosen rook are on the player's first rank, neither the king nor the chosen rook has previously moved, and there are no pieces between the king and the chosen rook. The king allow move to right or left two steps, if king move to right side, the rock should be the left of the king.or king move to left side, the rock should be the right of the king.
        Parameters:
        x - Row coordinate of start position.
        y - Column coordinate of start position.
        a - Row coordinate of end position.
        b - Column coordinate of end position.
